message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $11,500. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal.
Bob, I understand your position, but $10,500 is a bit too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $11,000? This product is truly worth it.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still a bit hesitant. How about we try $10,750? I'm really close to walking away, but I still think this product would be a great addition to my collection.
